title: hi, i was on topsail beach on aug 5th, 2015 for the sea turtles! 1 of ur reporters was there, and i wanted to know if he will have an article, about that evening. i come from culpeper, va. 2-4 times a season(since 2007) i would love to see an article- maybe with my name in it, or pics that they took that night. please let me know, i love it there, thanks, joanne
text:
hereÍs a link to a story about sea turtles
